sql.statement: select 'Last Data Refresh' label , to_char(load_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') description from rev_dash_control

select nvl(b.cat_type, a.cat_type) cat_type , nvl(b.cat_id, a.cat_id) cat_id , nvl(b.cat_name, a.cat_name) cat_name from (select yc.rev_year , yc.record_source , yc.cat_type , yc.cat_id , (case when yc.cat_type='all' then to_char(rev_date, 'fmMonth YYYY') else c.cat_name end) cat_name from rev_dash_yr_categories yc join rev_dash_category c on yc.cat_type = c.cat_type and yc.cat_id = c.cat_id cross join (select trunc(load_date-7,'MM') rev_date from rev_dash_control) where yc.rev_year = nvl({rev_year},'2013') and yc.cat_type = 'all') a full outer join (select yc.rev_year , yc.record_source , (case when count(case when yc.cat_type = 'rep_id' then 1 end) > 0 then 'rep_id' when count(case when yc.cat_type = 'sales_mgr_id' then 1 end) > 0 then 'sales_mgr_id' --when count(case when yc.cat_type = 'gm_id' then 1 end) > 0 then 'gm_id' end) cat_type , yc.cat_id , c.cat_name from rev_dash_yr_categories yc join rev_dash_category c on yc.record_source = c.record_source and yc.cat_type = c.cat_type and yc.cat_id = c.cat_id where yc.cat_id = lpad({employee_id},6,'0') and yc.cat_type in ('rep_id','sales_mgr_id','gm_id') and yc.rev_year = nvl({rev_year},'2013') group by yc.rev_year , yc.record_source , yc.cat_id , c.cat_name) b on 1=1

select c.cat_type , c.record_source||'-'||c.cat_id cat_id , (case when a.cat_type='all' then to_char(rev_date, 'fmMonth YYYY') else c.cat_name end) cat_name from (select id , c.rev_year , c.record_source , (case when id = 1 then 'all' when id = 2 then 'channel_code' when id = 3 then 'region_code' when id = 4 then 'campaign_code' when id = 5 then 'gm_id' when id = 6 then 'sales_mgr_id' when id = 7 then 'rep_id' end) cat_type , (case when id = 1 then 'ALL' when id = 2 then c.channel_code when id = 3 then c.region_code when id = 4 then c.campaign_code when id = 5 then c.gm_id when id = 6 then c.sales_mgr_id when id = 7 then c.rep_id end) cat_id from (select level id from dual connect by level <= 7) gen , rev_dash_yr_categories c where c.rev_year = nvl({rev_year},'2013') and c.cat_type = {cat_type} and c.cat_id = {cat_id} and gen.id not in (3,5) and ( (c.cat_type = 'gm_id' and id in (1,2,3)) or (c.cat_type = 'sales_mgr_id' and id in (1,2,3,5)) or (c.cat_type = 'rep_id' and id in (1,2,3,5)) or (c.cat_type = 'campaign_code' and id in (1,2,3)) or (c.cat_type = 'channel_code' and id in (1,3)) or (c.cat_type = 'region_code') ) ) a join rev_dash_yr_categories b on a.rev_year = b.rev_year and a.record_source = b.record_source and a.cat_type = b.cat_type and a.cat_id = b.cat_id join rev_dash_category c on b.record_source = c.record_source and b.cat_type = c.cat_type and b.cat_id = c.cat_id cross join (select trunc(load_date-7,'MM') rev_date from rev_dash_control) order by a.id

select cat_type , cat_id , cat_name , cat_desc from (select yc.cat_type, yc.cat_id , (case when yc.cat_type='all' then to_char(rev_date, 'fmMonth YYYY') else c.cat_name end) cat_name , (case yc.cat_type when 'channel_code' then 'Channel' when 'region_code' then 'Region' when 'campaign_code' then 'Campaign' when 'gm_id' then 'GM' when 'sales_mgr_id' then 'Sales Manager' when 'rep_id' then 'Rep' end) cat_desc , row_number() over(partition by 1 order by instr(lower(c.cat_name), lower({search})) , cat_name) rnum from rev_dash_yr_categories yc join rev_dash_category c on yc.record_source = c.record_source and yc.cat_type = c.cat_type and yc.cat_id = c.cat_id cross join (select trunc(load_date-7,'MM') rev_date from rev_dash_control) where lower(c.cat_name) like '%'||lower({search})||'%' and yc.rev_year = nvl({rev_year},'2013') and yc.cat_type not in ('office_code','region_code','gm_id') ) where rnum <= 30 order by rnum

yp_hndl_amt = 0 -- then (case when yp_obj = 0 then 0 else 1 end) -- else round(yp_obj/yp_hndl_amt,4) - 1 -- end) * 100 5 yp_obj_pct , --(case when prev_yp_hndl_amt = 0 -- then (case when prev_yp_obj = 0 then 0 else 1 end) -- else round(prev_yp_obj/prev_yp_hndl_amt,4) - 1 -- end) * 100 5 prev_yp_obj_pct , (case when yp_obj = 0 then (case when yp_amt = 0 then 0 else 1 end) else greatest(round(prev_yp_sold_amt/prev_yp_obj,4),0) -- end) * 100 5 prev_yp_pct_to_obj , yp_amt - prev_yp_amt yp_chg_amt , --(case when iyp_hndl_amt = 0 -- then (case when iyp_obj = 0 then 0 else 1 end) -- else round(iyp_obj/iyp_hndl_amt,4) - 1 -- end) * 100 5 iyp_obj_pct , --(case when prev_iyp_hndl_amt = 0 -- then (case when prev_iyp_obj = 0 then 0 else 1 end) -- else round(prev_iyp_obj/prev_iyp_hndl_amt,4) - 1 -- end) * 100 prev_iyp_obj_pct 5 prev_iyp_obj_pct , (case when iyp_obj = 0 then (case when iyp_amt = 0 then 0 else 1 end) else greatest(round(iyp_amt/iyp_obj,4),0) end) * 100 iyp_pct_to_obj , (case when prev_iyp_obj = 0 then (case when prev_iyp_amt = 0 then 0 else 1 end) else greatest(round(prev_iyp_amt/prev_iyp_obj,4),0) end) * 100 prev_iyp_pct_to_obj , iyp_amt - prev_iyp_amt iyp_chg_amt , --(case when hndl_amt = 0 -- then (case when obj = 0 then 0 else 1 end) -- else round(obj/hndl_amt,4) - 1 -- end) * 100 5 obj_pct , --(case when prev_hndl_amt = 0 -- then (case when prev_obj = 0 then 0 else 1 end) -- else round(prev_obj/prev_hndl_amt,4) - 1 --end) * 100 5 prev_obj_pct , (case when obj = 0 then (case when amt = 0 then 0 else 1 end) else greatest(round(amt/obj,4),0) end) * 100 pct_to_obj , (case when prev_obj = 0 then (case when prev_amt = 0 then 0 else 1 end) else greatest(round(prev_amt/prev_obj,4),0) end) * 100 prev_pct_to_obj , amt - prev_amt chg_amt , (case when prev_sold_amt = 0 then (case when sold_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((sold_amt-prev_sold_amt)/prev_sold_amt,4) end) sold_pct , (case when prev_hndl_amt = 0 then (case when hndl_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((hndl_amt-prev_hndl_amt)/prev_hndl_amt,4) end) hndl_pct , (case when prev_renewal_amt = 0 then (case when renewal_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((renewal_amt-prev_renewal_amt)/prev_renewal_amt,4) end) renewal_pct , (case when prev_increase_amt = 0 then (case when increase_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((increase_amt-prev_increase_amt)/prev_increase_amt,4) end) increase_pct , (case when prev_decrease_amt = 0 then (case when decrease_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((decrease_amt-prev_decrease_amt)/prev_decrease_amt,4) end) decrease_pct , (case when prev_cancel_amt = 0 then (case when cancel_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((cancel_amt-prev_cancel_amt)/prev_cancel_amt,4) end) cancel_pct , (case when prev_obl_amt = 0 then (case when obl_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((obl_amt-prev_obl_amt)/prev_obl_amt,4) end) obl_pct , (case when prev_new_amt = 0 then (case when new_amt > 0 then 1 else 0 end) else round((new_amt-prev_new_amt)/prev_new_amt,4) end) new_pct from (select d.rev_year , d.cat_type , d.cat_id , (case when d.cat_type='all' then to_char(rev_date, 'fmMonth YYYY') else c.cat_name end) cat_name --, sum(yp_asgn_amt) yp_asgn_amt , sum(yp_amt) yp_amt , sum(yp_hndl_amt) yp_hndl_amt , sum(yp_sold_amt) yp_sold_amt , sum(nvl(yp_obj,0)) yp_obj , sum(nvl(prev_yp_amt,0)) prev_yp_amt , sum(nvl(prev_yp_hndl_amt,0)) prev_yp_hndl_amt , sum(nvl(prev_yp_sold_amt,0)) prev_yp_sold_amt , sum(nvl(prev_yp_obj,0)) prev_yp_obj --, sum(iyp_asgn_amt) iyp_asgn_amt , sum(iyp_amt) iyp_amt , sum(iyp_hndl_amt) iyp_hndl_amt , sum(iyp_sold_amt) iyp_sold_amt , sum(iyp_obj) iyp_obj , sum(nvl(prev_yp_hndl_amt,0)) prev_iyp_hndl_amt , sum(nvl(prev_iyp_amt,0)) prev_iyp_amt , sum(nvl(prev_iyp_sold_amt,0)) prev_iyp_sold_amt , sum(nvl(prev_iyp_obj,0)) prev_iyp_obj , sum(tot_cnt) cnt --, sum(tot_asgn_cnt) asgn_cnt , sum(tot_hndl_cnt) hndl_cnt , sum(tot_sold_cnt) sold_cnt , sum(tot_renewal_cnt) renewal_cnt , sum(tot_increase_cnt) increase_cnt , sum(tot_decrease_cnt) decrease_cnt , sum(tot_cancel_cnt) cancel_cnt , sum(tot_obl_cnt) obl_cnt , sum(tot_new_cnt) new_cnt --, sum(tot_asgn_cst) asgn_cst --, sum(tot_hndl_cst) hndl_cst --, sum(tot_asgn_amt) asgn_amt , sum(tot_amt) amt , sum(tot_hndl_amt) hndl_amt , sum(tot_sold_amt) sold_amt , sum(tot_renewal_amt) renewal_amt , sum(tot_increase_amt) increase_amt , sum(tot_decrease_amt) decrease_amt , sum(tot_cancel_amt) cancel_amt , sum(tot_obl_amt) obl_amt , sum(tot_new_amt) new_amt , sum(nvl(tot_obj,0)) obj , sum(nvl(prev_tot_amt,0)) prev_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_hndl_amt,0)) prev_hndl_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_sold_amt,0)) prev_sold_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_renewal_amt,0)) prev_renewal_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_increase_amt,0)) prev_increase_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_decrease_amt,0)) prev_decrease_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_cancel_amt,0)) prev_cancel_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_obl_amt,0)) prev_obl_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_new_amt,0)) prev_new_amt , sum(nvl(prev_tot_obj,0)) prev_obj , sum(ytd_amt) ytd_amt from (select nvl({cat_type},'all') cat_type , to_char(rev_date,'YYYY') rev_year , (case {cat_type} when 'rep_id' then rep_id when 'sales_mgr_id' then sales_mgr_id when 'gm_id' then gm_id when 'region_code' then region_code when 'office_code' then nvl(office_code,'NONE') when 'campaign_code' then campaign_code when 'channel_code' then nvl(channel_code,'NONE') else 'ALL' end) cat_id , s.* from rev_dash_month_smy s where rep_id = nvl({rep_id},rep_id) and sales_mgr_id = nvl({sales_mgr_id},sales_mgr_id) and gm_id = nvl({gm_id},gm_id) and region_code = nvl({region_code},region_code) and office_code = nvl({office_code},office_code) and campaign_code = nvl({campaign_code},campaign_code) and channel_code = nvl({channel_code},channel_code) and rev_date = (select trunc(load_date-7,'MM') from rev_dash_control) ) d left outer join rev_dash_category c on d.cat_type = c.cat_type and d.cat_id = c.cat_id group by d.rev_year , d.cat_id , (case when d.cat_type='all' then to_char(rev_date, 'fmMonth YYYY') else c.cat_name end) , d.cat_type ) t ) t order by cat_name , obj desc

select /*+ parallel(d,4) parallel(dci,4) */ d.customer_id , dci.customer_name , d.region_code , c1.cat_name region_name , d.product_code --, d.rev_year --, d.prd_month , d.campaign_code --, d.cvs_year --, d.cvs_month , d.rep_id , e2.cat_name rep_name , d.sales_mgr_id , e3.cat_name sales_mgr_name , d.gm_id , e4.cat_name gm_name , d.channel_code , d.office_code --, d.prospect_code --, d.pool_ind --, d.handled_ind --, d.product_type --, d.asgn_amt , d.rc , d.handled_rc , d.unhandled_rc , d.sold_rc , d.renewal_rc , d.increase_rc , d.decrease_rc , d.cancel_rc , d.obl_rc , d.new_rc --, d.bst_hndl_amt --, d.bst_sold_amt --, d.discon_amt --, d.delinq_amt from rev_dash_month_detail d join rev_dash_category c1 on d.record_source = c1.record_source and 'region_code' = c1.cat_type and d.region_code = c1.cat_id join rev_dash_customer dci on d.record_source = dci.record_source and d.customer_id = dci.customer_id left outer join rev_dash_employee e2 on d.record_source = e2.record_source and d.rep_id = e2.employee_id left outer join rev_dash_employee e3 on d.record_source = e3.record_source and d.sales_mgr_id = e3.employee_id left outer join rev_dash_employee e4 on d.record_source = e4.record_source and d.gm_id = e4.employee_id where rev_date = (select trunc(load_date-7,'MM') from rev_dash_control) and (({data_field} in ('cat_name','obj')) or (({data_field} in ('iyp_asgn_cnt','iyp_obj') and product_type = 'O') or ({data_field} in ('yp_asgn_cnt','yp_obj') and product_type != 'O')) or (({data_field} in ('hndl_amt') or ({data_field} in ('iyp_hndl_amt') and product_type = 'O') or ({data_field} in ('yp_hndl_amt') and product_type != 'O')) and handled_rc != 0) or (({data_field} in ('hndl_cnt') or ({data_field} in ('iyp_hndl_cnt') and product_type = 'O') or ({data_field} in ('yp_hndl_cnt') and product_type != 'O')) and handled_rc != 0) or (({data_field} in ('sold_amt','sold_cnt') or ({data_field} in ('iyp_sold_amt','iyp_sold_cnt') and product_type = 'O') or ({data_field} in ('yp_sold_amt','yp_sold_cnt') and product_type != 'O')) and sold_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('increase_amt','increase_cnt') and increase_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('decrease_amt','decrease_cnt') and decrease_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('renewal_amt','renewal_cnt') and renewal_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('cancel_amt','cancel_cnt') and cancel_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('obl_amt','obl_cnt') and obl_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('new_amt','new_cnt') and new_rc != 0) or ({data_field} in ('ytd_amt') and (rc != 0 or cancel_rc != 0)) or ({data_field} in ('amt') and rc != 0) )

with report_periods as (select rev_year report_year , (case when report_type='M' then add_months(start_report_period,(level-1)) --when report_type='W' then start_report_period + ((level-1)*7) --when report_type='D' then start_report_period + (level-1) end) report_date , rev_year , data_field , report_type , (case when report_type='M' then add_months(start_report_period,(level-1)) --when report_type='W' then start_report_period + ((level-1)*7) --when report_type='D' then start_report_period + (level-1) end) report_period from (select /*+ parallel(t,4) */ to_char(c.load_date-7,'YYYY') rev_year , 'M' report_type , {data_field} data_field , min(rev_date) start_report_period , max(rev_date) end_report_period from rev_dash_month_smy t cross join rev_dash_control c where rev_date >= add_months(trunc(c.load_date-7,'MM'),-12) and 'M' = {report_type} and nvl(case {data_field} when 'amt' then tot_amt when 'hndl_amt' then tot_hndl_amt --when 'asgn_cnt' then tot_asgn_cnt when 'yp_sold_amt' then yp_sold_amt when 'iyp_sold_amt' then iyp_sold_amt when 'sold_amt' then tot_sold_amt when 'increase_amt' then tot_increase_amt when 'decrease_amt' then tot_decrease_amt when 'renewal_amt' then tot_renewal_amt when 'cancel_amt' then tot_cancel_amt when 'obl_amt' then tot_obl_amt when 'new_amt' then tot_new_amt when 'ytd_amt' then ytd_amt end, 0) != 0 group by to_char(c.load_date-7,'YYYY') ) connect by level <= (case when report_type='M' then (months_between(end_report_period, start_report_period) + 1) --when report_type='W' then ((end_report_period-start_report_period)/7)+1 --when report_type='D' then end_report_period-start_report_period end) ) select to_char(report_period,'MM/DD/YYYY') kpi_date , (case when report_type='M' then to_char(report_period,'Mon YYYY') --when report_type='W' then to_char(report_period,'Mon D') --when report_type='D' then to_char(report_period,'Mon D') end) kpi_date_lbl , sum(kpi_val) kpi_val from (select p.report_date report_period , p.rev_year , p.report_type , nvl(case p.data_field when 'amt' then tot_amt when 'hndl_amt' then tot_hndl_amt --when 'asgn_cnt' then tot_asgn_cnt when 'yp_sold_amt' then yp_sold_amt when 'iyp_sold_amt' then iyp_sold_amt when 'sold_amt' then tot_sold_amt when 'increase_amt' then tot_increase_amt when 'decrease_amt' then tot_decrease_amt when 'renewal_amt' then tot_renewal_amt when 'cancel_amt' then tot_cancel_amt when 'obl_amt' then tot_obl_amt when 'new_amt' then tot_new_amt when 'ytd_amt' then ytd_amt end, 0) kpi_val from report_periods p left outer join (select /* parallel(t,4) */ t.*, 'M' report_type, rev_date report_period, to_char(c.load_date-7,'YYYY') rev_year from rev_dash_month_smy t cross join rev_dash_control c where rev_date >= add_months(trunc(c.load_date-7,'MM'),-12) and 'M' = {report_type} and rep_id = nvl({rep_id},rep_id) and sales_mgr_id = nvl({sales_mgr_id},sales_mgr_id) and gm_id = nvl({gm_id},gm_id) and region_code = nvl({region_code},region_code) and office_code = nvl({office_code},office_code) and campaign_code = nvl({campaign_code},campaign_code) and channel_code = nvl({channel_code},channel_code)) h on p.rev_year = h.rev_year and p.report_type = h.report_type and p.report_period = h.report_period ) group by report_period , (case when report_type='M' then to_char(report_period,'Mon YYYY') --when report_type='W' then to_char(report_date,'Mon D') --when report_type='D' then to_char(report_date,'Mon D') end) order by report_period desc

with report_periods as (select to_date(lpad(level,2,'0')||to_char(load_date-7,'YYYY'),'MMYYYY') rev_date , to_char(load_date-7,'YYYY') rev_year , {data_field} data_field , {report_type} report_type from rev_dash_control connect by level <= 12 ) select to_char(report_period,'DD/MM/YYYY') kpi_date , to_char(report_period,'Mon') kpi_date_lbl , sum(case when is_current = 'N' then kpi_val else 0 end) prev_kpi_val , sum(case when is_current = 'Y' then kpi_val else 0 end) kpi_val from (select p.report_period , p.rev_year , p.is_current , p.report_type , nvl(case p.data_field when 'amt' then tot_amt when 'hndl_amt' then tot_hndl_amt --when 'asgn_cnt' then tot_asgn_cnt when 'yp_sold_amt' then yp_sold_amt when 'iyp_sold_amt' then iyp_sold_amt when 'sold_amt' then tot_sold_amt when 'increase_amt' then tot_increase_amt when 'decrease_amt' then tot_decrease_amt when 'renewal_amt' then tot_renewal_amt when 'cancel_amt' then tot_cancel_amt when 'obl_amt' then tot_obl_amt when 'new_amt' then tot_new_amt when 'ytd_amt' then ytd_amt end, 0) kpi_val from (select rev_date , 'Y' is_current , rev_year , data_field , report_type , rev_date report_period from report_periods union all select add_months(rev_date,-12) rev_date , 'N' is_current , (case when report_type='M' then to_char(rev_year-1) --when report_type='W' then rev_year --when report_type='D' then rev_year end) rev_year , data_field , report_type , rev_date report_period from report_periods ) p left outer join (select /*+ parallel(t,4) */ t.*, to_char(c.load_date-7,'YYYY') rev_year from rev_dash_month_smy t cross join rev_dash_control c where 'M' = {report_type} and rep_id = nvl({rep_id},rep_id) and sales_mgr_id = nvl({sales_mgr_id},sales_mgr_id) and gm_id = nvl({gm_id},gm_id) and region_code = nvl({region_code},region_code) and office_code = nvl({office_code},office_code) and campaign_code = nvl({campaign_code},campaign_code) and channel_code = nvl({channel_code},channel_code)) h on p.rev_date = h.rev_date ) group by report_period, to_char(report_period,'Mon') order by report_period desc

select e.work_email , (case when length(e.mobile_phone) = 10 then substr(e.mobile_phone,1,3)||'.'||substr(e.mobile_phone,4,3)||'.'||substr(e.mobile_phone,7,4) end) mobile_phone , (case when length(e.work_phone) = 10 then substr(e.work_phone,1,3)||'.'||substr(e.work_phone,4,3)||'.'||substr(e.work_phone,7,4) end) work_phone , work_phone_ext , e.home_email , (case when length(e.home_phone) = 10 then substr(e.home_phone,1,3)||'.'||substr(e.home_phone,4,3)||'.'||substr(e.home_phone,7,4) end) home_phone , (case when length(e.office_phone) = 10 then substr(e.office_phone,1,3)||'.'||substr(e.office_phone,4,3)||'.'||substr(e.office_phone,7,4) end) office_phone , office_address1 office_address , office_address2 , office_city , office_state , office_zip from rev_dash_employee e where e.employee_id = {employee_id}
